posts.title: Notes on A Programmable Web by Aaron Swartz
posts.description: At the time when I was getting into web development, I had the chance to read one of the most inspiring book about the web, Aaron Swartz's A Programmable Web.
posts.author: Shu

posts.title: Code blocks
posts.description: Some unpolished quick notes on when and how we should design and use UI animations in a web application.
